# Stoneskin, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[7th Level Druid Spells|Druid 7]], [[Earth (Domain)|Earth 8]], [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[Strength (Domain)|Strength 8]], [[6th Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 14th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 14]], [[BoXM 12th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 12]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (Granite and 500 gp worth of diamond dust sprinkled on the targetâ€™s skin)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 hour/level or until discharged

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** The Mage's Tower

The warded creature gains resistance to blows, cuts, stabs, and slashes. The subject gains damage reduction 20/[[Adamantine|adamantine]]. (It ignores the first 20 points of damage each time it takes damage from a weapon, though an [[Adamantine|adamantine]] weapon bypasses the reduction.) Once the spell has prevented a total of 20 points of damage per caster level (maximum 300 points), it is discharged.
